name: Valkyrie
description:
Team GameShow First game!

this is the post jam version of Gm48 Valkyrie!

The beings of dark lay siege to the floating isles of light! As the Valkyrie, rescue the angels before each island falls apart.

Play though the Story, or go for the High Score in Endless mode!

Game By:

Music by ForteFortissimo

Art by Seltzy

Programming by SingleShotGamer

Thank you And Have Fun!

⌨️Default KeyBinds:

Don't like these buttons? Rebind them in the options menu!

Arrow KeysMoveZJump
XAttackCDashESCPause

Note* game-pad can not be rebound. but its there if you prefer it!
